# snapshot(for:)

**Instance Method**

Returns a representation of the current state of the data in the specified section of the collection view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency func snapshot(for section: SectionIdentifierType) -> NSDiffableDataSourceSectionSnapshot<ItemIdentifierType>
```

## Updating section data

- **apply(_:to:animatingDifferences:completion:)**: Updates the section UI to reflect the state of the data in the specified snapshot, optionally animating the UI changes and executing a completion handler.
- **apply(_:to:animatingDifferences:)**: Updates the section UI to reflect the state of the data in the specified snapshot, optionally animating the UI changes.
